5df75cf16b05c.Name: LLPG - MYSERVICES - address postcode lookup
5df75cf16b05c.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59c0a03ddebc1","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) AS display, uprn AS name,
sao AS flat,
pao AS house,
street_name AS street,
town_name AS town , 
county_name AS county,
postcode,
uprn,
ward,
lng,
lat,
locality_name AS locality,
usrn
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 100","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

591f0c47c72b0.Name: LLPG Firmstep
591f0c47c72b0.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59c0a03ddebc1","new_category":"LLPG","secure_fields_db_database":"","results_page_columns_db":"","lookup_validation":"0","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name,
sao as flat,
pao as house,
street_name as street,
town_name as town , 
county_name as county,
postcode,
uprn,ward,lng,lat, locality_name as locality, usrn
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 100"}

props.label: staticText 1
props.content:
(Regulation (EC) No. 852/2004 on the Hygiene of Foodstuffs, Article 6(2))

This form should be completed by food business operators in respect of new food business establishments and submitted to the relevant food authority 28 days before commencing food operations.

Before completing this form, please read the Food Business Registration Notes (opens in new tab).

The local authority will enter the details on its Food Premises Register. A register of addresses and the type of business carried on at each will be open to inspection by the general public. Records of the other information provided will not be publicly available except in accordance with specific legislation and Data Protection requirements. Additionally the information will be shared with other Council departments and Essex County Council Trading Standards to assist in improving services provided by the Councils and to meet statutory obligations. Information will not be shared with any other third parties and will be disposed of when no longer required.

This authority is however under a duty to protect the public funds it administers, and to this end may use the information you have provided on this form for the prevention and detection of fraud. It may also share this information with other bodies responsible for auditing or administering public funds for these purposes. For further information, refer to the Council’s website.

props.label: Address of establishment (or address at which moveable establishment is kept)
